popups.title: Solar Array
popups.description: A group of solar pannels that are the main source of power for the satellite

popups.title: X-Band High Gain Antenna
popups.description: An antenna that is compact and transmits data from the satellite's payload to earth

popups.title: DSOC (Deep Space Optical Communications
popups.description: An experitmental high-bandwidth communications device wich aims to take space communications to the next frontier. DSOC uses lasers to send data 10 times faster than current means.

popups.title: Magnetometers
popups.description: A device that is used to measure the satellite's orientation and the geomagnetic filed of its orbit

popups.title: Gamma-Ray Spectrometer
popups.description: An instrument that is used to detect gamma rays that are used to study the composition of planets and other celestial bodies
